title: Collage with 宝贝

metadata.label: Donors
metadata.value: Stephen E. Davis, Amanda Yan (Fish Machine [3])

description:
Collage on cardstock and photo paper.

The centerpiece of this collage is a portrait of the male tenant of this residence, Stephen E. Davis. Born on August 6, 1999, in Baltimore, Maryland, Mr. Davis is a highly divisive figure due to his penchant for imitating a Singaporean accent and claiming he came from “the hood,” even though he is a red-blooded Ohioan. This collage is a testament to what Mr. Davis enjoys: coffee, restaurants, animals, America and technology.

This collage was designed by Magdalene Lam, as a gift to Stephen E. Davis for finally starting to frame all the prints they have collected since pre-union.

images.caption: [1] Stephen E. Davis, [2] Cool Frog, [3] Fish Machine, [4] Restaurant (NYC), [5] Cool Dog, [6] Coffee Otters, [7] Almost Sleeping Cat, [8] Unknown
Original Collage (mixed media on cardstock and photo paper)
